narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
Applicant wishes to be licensed as a class "C" Exhibitor.
Please issue a class "C" License
A copy of this inspection report and Initial License Fee must be mailed to:
USDA APHIS Animal Care                                                                                                                                        
920 Main Campus Drive, Suite 200                                                                                                                  
Raleigh, NC 27606
Standards and record keeping requirements have been discussed.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITY MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL A LICENSE IS OBTAINED
Exit interview conducted with Managing Director/Applicant.
